question: You and a couple of your colleagues would like to participate in a work-related seminar.Write a letter to your colleague who is the person in charge of the seminar and ask for:Detailed information regarding the datesProgram schedule        Enquire about cost and possible discounts for groups
text: I am writing this letter to enquire about the "Database Programming" seminar which was expected to be scheduled in the second quarter of the year. I  and a few teammates are very keen to attend the session as the knowledge of programming datasets will enhance our skillset.

Firstly, kindly provide the schedule and duration of the curriculum. Additionally, I would be grateful if you could also share the agenda of the session along with who is going to the session and what topics will be covered. We are very delighted about the course as the database designing expertise will help us to resolve the database glitches.

Secondly, I would like to know the pricing of the course and if there is a possibility of getting an early bird discount if we book the slot right away or any other group discounts as we are 4 in numbers.
I hope, you will consider our group and provide us with the best deal.
